price: Wͻn ntadeε bεyε εhyε tuntum, na Ogya bεkata wͻn anim.
arabic: سَرَابِيلُهُم مِّن قَطِرَانٖ وَتَغۡشَىٰ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: sarābīluhum min qaṭirānin wataghshā wujūhahumu al-nāru
